name: furn-tester-deps
description: This package contains all dependencies needed to run FURNs automated testing framework. This includes WebDriverIO + Appium dependencies.

resolutions.justifications.wdio-json-reporter/jest-matchers/jest-me: There is a security risk associated with this package version (it's a very outdated packaged, 2.0.0). Therefore, we are forcing an upgrade to the patched version.
There is a security risk associated with this package version (it's a very outdated packaged, 1.8.2). Therefore, we are forcing an upgrade to the patched version.
